content: such a sweet little hat with a pretty lower edge perfect for a newborn baby girl 0 - 3 months there are also matching booties if you want to make a little set requirements dk yarn around 16g of acrylic dk 4mm needles gauge / gauge 22sts = 4 10cm this hat is knitted top-down - it s unusual but very effective **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
